sentences.sContent: You’re wrong, and I can prove it.
To prove his point (= show that he was right ) , he mentioned several other experiments which had produced similar results.
sentences.sCn: 为了证明自己的观点，他提到了另外几个结果相似的实验。

sentences.sContent: ...involving their parents in the decision-making process may prove very important...
...could not prove that animals cry tears from emotion...
...regulating sugar will prove particularly tricky because it goes beyond health concerns; sugar...
...The 10-hour days crashed around my head; no amount of make-up could disguise my ill health as I battled against the odds to prove to myself that I could still make it in the business world...

phrases.pCn: 足以证明；证实[常用在it之后]
v. 勘探；证明符合…的条件；试验

words.tran: 证明地；可查验地；试验得出地
证明；检验；表现出；钻探（prove的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to show that something is true by providing facts, information etc
